numbrix
Class NumbrixText

java.lang.Object
  numbrix.NumbrixText

public class NumbrixText
extends java.lang.Object

A program to play a text-based version of the Numbrix game.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam Eary

Constructor Detail

NumbrixText

public NumbrixText()
Constructor for the NumbrixText class. Prompts the user to start a new game.

Method Detail

menu

public void menu()
Displays the game menu and responds to the user's menu option choice.

newGameType

public void newGameType()
Prompts the user to choose the initial game type. The choices are new blank game or load a game based on a file.

inputData

public void inputData()
This will start the input-data prompt. It will also start the menu prompt if the menu command has been called. Finally, it will start the end of game dialogue if the game has been completed.

displayBoard

public void displayBoard()
Displays the game board print-out.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main class of the NumbrixText program. This starts the program.

Parameters:
args - Arguments passed to the main method upon execution.
